title: Binding Strike
markdown: You wreathe your weapon or unarmed attack in magical energy meant to bind an enemy. Make a Strike. If you hit and deal damage, the foe must make a Fortitude save against your Spell DC. On a failure, the foe is Grabbed by magical energy. This lasts for as long as you Sustain this effect (using the Sustain a Spell action) or until they successfully Escape against your spell DC.
